item.description:
This is a RARE opportunity to see one of salsa music's LEGENDS -- Larry Harlow!

Join us Saturday, December 23rd at the beautiful Presidential Ballroom in the Hyatt Regency Cambridge, overlooking Boston, for an unforgettable concert. Larry Harlow with his ENTIRE orchestra will be performing his timeless salsa hits.

This is a NOT TO BE MISSED event!

-------------------
What the experts are saying about Larry Harlow and Orchestra:

....."THOROUGHLY ENTERTAINING...If you like salsa, and especially if you are an aficionado of what hard-core enthusiasts call 'la salsa brava,"

....."That special sound that the Fania created is still alive and well in the Larry Harlow Orchestra. The band was tight, the singing was inspired and the dance floor was packed!"

-------------------
Ticket Price:

$35 at the door; $25 in advance
>>>$20 for Meetup Group Members ONLY if Purchased BEFORE Dec 9th !!!

Register online today through paypal! Now paypal account needed.

-------------------
Larry Harlow Bio:

Larry Harlow, is one of the founding members of the legendary salsa band "La Fania All Stars". "El Judio Maravilloso", as he is affectionately called by his colleagues, completely revolutionized what is known today as "SALSA". Harlow developed the explosive trumpet/trombone sound. He has produced over 260 CD's for various artists and as a leader over 50 cd's including the Masterpiece, "La Raza Latina, a Salsa Suite" in 1978

Pianist, composer, bandleader, Latin music icon: For more: http://www.larryharlo...

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Larry Harlow Salsa Gala Extravaganza!
